message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $1200000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to consider a price of $900000. Can you meet me at that level?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you think the product is pricey, but I'm confident that it's worth more than $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer you the product for $1100000. Is this a price you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider meeting me at that level?

I appreciate your willingness to go up to $950000, Bob, but I'm still not convinced that's a fair price for this product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can offer the product to you for $1050000. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $975000, but that's my final offer. I hope you can meet me at this level.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not convinced that $975000 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to make one more serious offer, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can offer the product to you for $1150000. This is a compromise, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I hope you'll consider it seriously.

Alice, I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I've already gone up to $975000, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think we're getting close to the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can you consider meeting me at $1000000?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not convinced that $1000000 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to make one last serious offer, and I'm willing to compromise on the price. I can offer the product to you for $1200000, but I need to make it clear that this is my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
